query.formula: strategy opt = minE (C) [<=HORIZON]{ next_phase, phase, waiting[0], waiting[1], waiting[2], waiting[3], waiting[4], waiting[5], waiting[6], waiting[7], waiting[8], waiting[9], waiting[10], waiting[11], waiting[12], waiting[13], waiting[14], waiting[15], waiting[16], waiting[17], waiting[18], waiting[19] }->{t, ctrl.x}:<> t>=HORIZON
